title: Parliamentary panel for innovative tools like green banks, renewable finance obligation to boost clean ene - Economic Times
content: Parliamentary panel for innovative tools like green banks, renewable finance obligation to boost clean ene  Economic Times
description: Keeping in view that the overall debt requirement is large and reducing the cost of financing to the renewable energy developers is important, it also suggested that the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) may explore the possibility of prescribing Renewable Finance Obligation on the lines of Renewable Purchase Obligation (RPO) for banks and financial institutions.
